website_summaries.verdict: Budget-conscious parents will appreciate that this Britax car seat offers similar safety features as pricier models by the brand, yet comes at a price that is significantly lower than others on our list.
pros: An updated car seat by the brand with a price that falls on the lower end of the spectrum
Offers impact protection and shock absorbing abilities like those on pricier Britax models
cons: Straps are hard to adjust for very small babies
Has fewer reclining positions than costlier seats

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Bought then because they had a great sale ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Bought then because they had a great sale on it and it sat in my son's closet for 5 months. He is now 9 months, decided to get it out and start using and the whole side is ripped, nothing that can be done as it's past the return window. I am left to wonder if it was used, dropped, damaged, etc and am worried to have my son be in it. These are not cheap, so I am pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2shop

customer_reviews.title: Love that it clicks into place using the car belt
customer_reviews.text: Love that it clicks into place using the car belt! It feels so secure! Watching how to install on YouTube was much easier than following the thick book of instructions. Just make sure of the height and weight requirements for the seat and your state.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: I have had this car seat 4 months and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this car seat 4 months and the white cording framing seat is fraying....is this inferior material.....is all the material inferior....will the material not last the life of car seat.I did not expect this of BRITAX. very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Strange

customer_reviews.title: It's been a fine carseat and it seems very safe
customer_reviews.text: I have had this carseat for three months now. It's been a fine carseat and it seems very safe. I took it out the other day to move it to another car and noticed that the white seam is shredding. I'm kind of mad I spent so much on a carseat that looks bad after so short of a time. I love britax and really trust their safety but this seems like a defect.
customer_reviews.author: Amy petersen

customer_reviews.title: Good carseat, no complaints so far
customer_reviews.text: Good carseat. We got it on some lightning sale for $125 so its worth it for that price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat, Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great seat, very comfortable, easy to install, Safe and secure to the bottom seat. We do not regret buying this seat and will buy another for the other car soon.
customer_reviews.author: MadisonMom

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here. When installed properly and our kids ...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here. When installed properly and our kids are strapped in properly, I feel there as safe as there going to be in a car seat.
customer_reviews.author: N.A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safety ratings for the price point and our daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Boulevard now, so I think that says it all. Excellent safety ratings for the price point and our daughter seems to really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is great. It is super easy to clean. This is the BEST carseat!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great child car seat. very safe and comfortable for my son. easy to adjust the shoulder height.
customer_reviews.author: C Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Another great car seat from top rated britax
customer_reviews.text: Another great car seat from top rated britax. Used to buy other brands but once I brought a britax I never wanted to buy another car seat. I know about carsears, I own 8 of them.
customer_reviews.author: ck839800

customer_reviews.title: Fit and finish and build quality is superior. I won't buy another brand
customer_reviews.text: How do you put a price on your childs safty? Britax is well worth the extra money. Fit and finish and build quality is superior. I won't buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: ianh2o

customer_reviews.title: I love britax carseats
customer_reviews.text: I love britax carseats, but this ones fabric has already been freying and pulling apart. It is very frustrating considering the amount of money they cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Painter

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat, could use a couple improvements
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat. The only things I don't like is the click feature when you tighten the straps is never, ever tight enough, so it seems quite pointless. I always check and tighten it at least two more times. Other thing I don't like is that it's a little hard to install at the proper angle when you rear face. The line on the side that supposed to be your guideline can never be quite horizontal as it should be. Other than that, I do like it though, and I'm a big Britax fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Britax Boulevard G4.1 Convertible Car seat
customer_reviews.text: Got a better price on this expensive car seat by shopping the open box and used items. The seat was brand new with only the boxing damaged. This is a great car seat and seems to offer very good protection. Although the base seems small, does have a double strapping system to hold the seat in place.
customer_reviews.author: Pops_Silva_Fox

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy car seat that is easy to install and remove
customer_reviews.text: Showed up as advertised. Very sturdy car seat that is easy to install and remove.
customer_reviews.author: SDbuyer14

customer_reviews.title: Another great car seat from Britax.
customer_reviews.text: The Britax Boulevard G4.1 is a great sturdy car seat. Our toddler fits in well and seems secure. So far a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ju-Miao Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I've had this seat for roughly a year. My son was 2 1/2 months premature and is obviously a little small and he also has cerebral palsy. This seat suits him perfect. He just turned two and we still rear face him. I love the steel frame and I really couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: April Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Was for our grandson who lives in England. He will be able to use it for several years. Easy to install. The EMS showed us how---a rule here. We did buy the pad so it wouldn't cut our leather seats. Worked well. He is still facing back, but will soon be of age and weight to face forward.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome R Calvert

product_meta.title: Britax Boulevard G4.1 Convertible Car Seat, Domino
product_meta.description:
Designed with superior safety and excellent comfort, the Boulevard Convertible Car Seat is an exceptional choice for getting your family where they need to go. SafeCell Impact Protection surrounds your child in safety components that work together to protect well beyond the established federal safety standards. The Boulevard features Complete Side Impact Protection PLUS providing an advanced layer of protection with a deep protective shell and an energy-absorbing foam headrest designed to keep your child's head and neck extra secure.

BRAND STORY
By Britax
feature_bullets: Safecell impact protection is an integrated system of safety components, including an impact absorbing base, tether and harness, an impact stabilizing steel frame, and complete side impact protection plus

SafeCell complete side impact protection plus provides an advanced level of protection: a deep, foam lined shell absorbs crash forces and shields your child from debris, and an energy absorbing headrest keeps your child's head and neck secure
Click and safe snug harness indicator gives an audible click to aid you in the proper tightening of your child's harness

Safecell impact protection is an integrated system of safety components, including an impact absorbing base, tether and harness, an impact stabilizing steel frame, and complete side impact protection plus

SafeCell complete side impact protection plus provides an advanced level of protection: a deep, foam lined shell absorbs crash forces and shields your child from debris, and an energy absorbing headrest keeps your child's head and neck secure
Click and safe snug harness indicator gives an audible click to aid you in the proper tightening of your child's harness
Removable body pillow enhances your child’s comfort and relaxation
